pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 3, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, November 3, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and members of Cabinet will participate in a town hall with high school students to mark the oneâ€‘year anniversary of the government.

Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:30 a.m.
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a press conference.

Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Open coverage


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
